form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: NOTICE OF ENTRY OF APPEARANCE AS ATTORNEY OR REPRESENTATIVE, G-28

full_text: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JU E Board of Immigration Appeals and Immigration and Naturalization Service NOTICE OF ENTRY OF APPEARANCE AS ATTORNEY OR REPRESENTATIVE In re: DATE: March 31, 1969 GEORGE WOLFSON FILE NO.: I hereby enter my appearance as attorney for (or representative of) the person whose name appears immediately below, and my appearance is made at his (her) request. NAME GEORGE WOLFSON ADDRESS (Apt. No.) (Number and Street) (City) (State) (Zip Code) 711 Westmount, Apt. 5, West Hollywood, California Check applicable item(s) below. 1. I am an attorney and a member in good standing of the bar of the Supreme Court of the United States or of the highest court of the following State, territory, insular possession, or District of Columbia California Supreme Court (Name of court) and am not under a court or administrative agency order suspending, enjoining, restraining, disbarring, or otherwise restricting me in practicing law. 2. I am an accredited representative of the following named religious, charitable, social service, or similar organization established in the United States and which is so recognized by the Board: 3. I am associated with , the attorney of record who previously filed a notice of appearance in this case and my appearance is at his request. (If you check this item, also check item 1 or 2, whichever is appropriate. ) 4. Others (Explain fully.) Signature Complete Address Rs POPKIN & SHAMIR 5670 Wilshire Blvd., , Suite 1885 Los Angeles, California 90036. NAME-Type or print RUTH SHAMIR Telephone number 938-3268. Form G-28 (Rev. 3-10-67)
